I have planning documents for LLM Conclave Consult Mode in _bmad-output/planning-artifacts/.

  Phase 1 (Core Consultation) is complete. Please implement Phase 2 (Tracking & Metrics):

  1. Create ConsultLogger (src/utils/ConsultLogger.ts)
     - Log consultations to ~/.llm-conclave/consult-logs/
     - Save both JSON (full result) and Markdown (summary)
     - Create monthly index files (index-YYYY-MM.json)
     - Track: id, timestamp, question, duration, cost, confidence

  2. Create consult-stats command (src/commands/consult-stats.ts)
     - CLI: llm-conclave consult-stats [options]
     - Options: --month YYYY-MM, --week, --all-time
     - Display dashboard with:
       - Usage metrics (total consultations, active days, avg per day)
       - Performance metrics (p50, p95, p99 response times)
       - Cost metrics (total cost, avg per consultation, total tokens)
     - Format: ASCII table with emojis (âœ… âš¡ ðŸ’° ðŸŽ¯)

  3. Integrate ConsultLogger into consult command
     - Auto-log every consultation result
     - Ensure logs directory is created

  4. Register consult-stats command in index.ts

  Key constraints:
  - Log directory: ~/.llm-conclave/consult-logs/
  - Index format: { month: "YYYY-MM", consultations: [...] }
  - Stats should read all JSON logs and compute metrics
  - Dashboard should be readable and actionable

  Start with ConsultLogger implementation. Test by running a consultation and verifying logs are created.
